header.imgInputLabel: I allow my image to be shown to other students & staff

location.title: Location
location.popup: Some of our services are only available in certain areas. Knowing your location allows us to send you the right infos.
location.infoMsg: We will not refer any sensitive information to a third party; however, in order to offer tailor-made workshops or events close to you, we need your location details.
location.searchMsg: Search for your city and select it from the list

contactDetails.title: Contact information
contactDetails.popup: We will need your private email if you have to reset your {{orgDisplayName}} email account. We will contact you via phone for additional services.
contactDetails.infoMsg: {{orgDisplayName}} does not share your contact details with anybody without your permission.
contactDetails.whatsappCheck: {{orgDisplayName}} can contact me via WhatsApp Messenger on this number
contactDetails.whatsappCheckPositive: {{orgDisplayName}} <1>can</1> contact me via WhatsApp Messenger on this number
contactDetails.whatsappCheckNegative: {{orgDisplayName}} <1>cannot</1> contact me via WhatsApp Messenger on this number
contactDetails.emailMsg: Have a new <1>private</1> email address? You can change it here. We will send you a confirmation email to this address - <2>please confirm</2> it within the next days.
contactDetails.privateEmailReverted: Thank you. You reverted the change of your private email.

certificate.title: Confirmation of registration
certificate.desc: Do you need to prove that you are learning with {{orgDisplayName}}?
certificate.downloadLink: to upload a status document in order to download certificate of enrollment.
certificate.noFirstAndLastNameProvided: You need to provide your first and last name in order to receive a certificate.

COEContainer.question: What are you planning to use your certificate for in the next six months?
COEContainer.info: To download the certificate of enrollment, please select one or several uses of the certificate of enrollment above.

dataWallet.scan: Scan this code using the enmeshed app to connect this account
dataWallet.link: Link your account to your Enmeshed Data Wallet.
dataWallet.accountConnected: Your data wallet account is connected.

deletion.title: Delete My Account
deletion.desc: Permanently remove my account from the platform.
deletion.warning: This action can't be undone, so please be sure before proceeding!
deletion.hint: Just a quick reminder, closing your account means all your progress and data will be permanently deleted, including certifications you've received.
deletion.explainText: Please remember, this action is permanent and cannot be undone. Make sure you're certain before continuing.
deletion.success: Your account is now scheduled for deletion. If you change your mind, you can cancel the request within the next 14 days.
deletion.alreadyExists: A deletion request has already been made.
deletion.error: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.
